short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Element Block is a strategic game to arrange blocks to complete vertical or horizontal lines. You can play Offline!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your objective is to strategically arrange the blocks to form complete vertical or horizontal lines, aiming to accumulate as many points as you can. Remember, only full lines will vanish from the grid, so careful planning and observation of the available pieces are crucial. Be mindful of the limited grid space, as the game concludes if there are no vacant spots remaining to accommodate a block. Are you ready to embark on this challenging journey and test your puzzle-solving prowess?
**Noted: I have a button (unblocked games) to make it easier for users to access and explore more games on my website.
